properties.description:
The Livery is a very versatile venue in Lexington.
Originally, it was the city's largest stable for horses and carriages riding in and out of town. the original brick and rafters have been restored and it makes any event perfect!
properties.name: The Livery

properties.description: Moondance Amphitheater is an outdoor venue with tiered grass levels managed by Lexington Parks & Recreation. It offers live music and community events featuring local, regional and national talent.
properties.name: MoonDance Amphitheater

properties.description: It is a multipurpose venue in Lexington that hosts a variety of performances, exhibitions, and events.
properties.name: Downtown Arts Center

properties.description:
One of the oldest contemporary fine art galleries in Lexington, New Editions Gallery is recognized for the individuality of their artists and the exceptional quality of their work.

Opening in 1988, the gallery is now located in the heart of downtown one block off Main Street and Broadway, featuring two floors of well-lit exhibit space.
properties.name: New Editions Gallery

properties.description: Central Kentucky's professional ballet company with internationally renowned, world class dancers and flourishing academy.
properties.name: Kentucky Ballet Theatre

properties.description: Bowman, the Wildcat sculpture, stands for the pride students, alumni and employees share and serves as a friendly ambassador to campus visitors
properties.name: Wildcat

properties.description: The Lyric Theatre & Cultural Arts Center: A Living Legacy Reborn
properties.name: Lyric Theater

properties.description: Long-running community theater presenting a variety of productions in an intimate setting with free parking.
properties.name: Carriage House Theatre

properties.description: Relaxed venue offering local and national music acts across various genres, plus craft beers and cocktails.
properties.name: The Burl

properties.description: Listed on the National Register of Historic Places and the Charter Member of the League of the Historic American Theatres, the Lexington Opera House is one of the premiere performing arts centers in the region.
properties.name: Lexington Opera House
